item.title: CVE-2024-32149|2024-04-15T06:31:02.561Z -- blueglass -- jobs%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BlueGlass Jobs for WordPress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Jobs for WordPress: from n/a through 2.7.5.
